app.name: MzeeChakula
app.subtitle: Enkola y'emmere ya bakadde mu Uganda
app.tagline: Okuteekateeka emmere obulungi okusobola okuwangaala obulungi

home.description: Enkola ya AI ey'okuteekateeka emmere ya bakadde ng'ekozesa emmere z'omu Uganda

features.title: Ebintu
features.aiPoweredDesc: Tukozesa tekinologiya ey'amaanyi okugereranya ebikulu by'emmere
features.personalizedDesc: Enteekateeka etereddwamu emyaka, obulwadde n'ebyetaago by'emmere

chat.title: Omuyambi w'Okwogera
chat.subtitle: Yogera ne omuyambi waffe ow'obugezi ku mmere
chat.greeting: Oli otya! Nze omuyambi wo ku mmere. Ndi wano okukuyamba okuteekateeka emmere ennungi. Nkuyinza kutya okukuyamba?
chat.greetingWithInfo: Webale ku bubaka bwo! Ka nkubuuze ebibuuzo ebirala.
chat.askAge: Olina emyaka emeka? Londa: 60-70, 70-80, oba 80 n'okusingawo.
chat.askRegion: Ova mu kitundu ki mu Uganda? Wakati (Kampala/Buganda), Ebugwanjuba (Mbarara/Ankole), Ebuvanjuba (Mbale/Busoga), oba Obukiikakkono (Gulu/Acholi)?
chat.askCondition: Olina bulwadde bwonna? Nga: musujja gw'omusaayi, sukkaali, obutaba na musaayi, amagumba amanafu, omutima, ensigo, ennyingo, oba oli mulamu bulungi?
chat.askSeason: Tuli mu kiseera ki? Ekyeeya (ekikalu) oba enkuba?
chat.askNutrition: Olya mmere ki leero? Oyinza okugamba 'nalya matooke ne bijanjaalo' oba 'ennyenje n'enva'.
chat.demographicsComplete: Kirungi nnyo! Nfunye obubaka bwo. Kale ka tubuulire ku mmere yo.
chat.nutritionReceived: Webale! Nteese obubaka bwo ku mmere.
chat.askConfirm: Ebyo byonna bituufu? Gamba 'ye' okugenda mu maaso oba 'nedda' okutandika bupya.
chat.didNotUnderstand: Nsonyiwa, sitegedde bulungi. Osobola okwogera bupya?
chat.restartConversation: Ka tutandike bupya okuva ku ntandikwa.
chat.processingDescription: Nkola ku bubaka bwo era nteekateeka amagezi
chat.instruction4: Kirungi nnyo eri abakulu oba abo abaagala okwogera

pricing.title: Enteekateeka z'Ebbeeyi
pricing.subtitle: Londa enteekateeka ekukwata
pricing.faqQ1: Nnyinza ntya okukwaata enteekateeka ey'oku ddaala?
pricing.faqA1: Osobola okukwaata enteekateeka ey'oku ddaala essaawa yonna ng'oyita wano. Enkyukakyuka etandika amangwago.
pricing.faqQ2: Nsobola okukyusa wakati w'okusasula buli mwezi n'okusasula buli mwaka?
pricing.faqA2: Ye! Kyusa essaawa yonna. Okusasula buli mwaka kutereka 17% okusingawo okusasula buli mwezi.
pricing.faqA3: Tukkiriza Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), okussa mu bbanka, ne kaadi z'okusasula.
pricing.faqA4: Enteekateeka y'Ekibiina ya bwereere emirembe gyonna n'ebintu ebikulu. Enteekateeka ezibaako ensasula zitandika mangu nga zirondeddwa.

faq2.question: Nsobola okukyusa enteekateeka yange oluvannyuma?
faq2.answer: Ye, osobola okukwaata enteekateeka ey'oku ddaala oba okukka wansi essaawa yonna. Enkyukakyuka zitandika amangwago era tujja kukubalirira.

faq3.question: Mulinawo okugezaako okw'obwerere?
faq3.answer: Ye! Enteekateeka y'Ekibiina ya bwereere emirembe gyonna. Enteekateeka ezibaako ensasula ziwa ennaku 14 ez'okuzzaayo ssente.

faq4.question: Muwa discount eri NGOs?
faq4.answer: Ye, tuwa ebbeeyi ey'enjawulo eri NGOs, amalwaliro, n'ebitongole ebitali bya bizinensi. Tuweereze okufuna ebbeeyi ey'enjawulo.

pricing.contactUs: Ttiimu yaffe eri wano okukuyamba okulonda enteekateeka ekukwata.
pricing.contactDescription: Eri amalwaliro amanene oba NGOs, tusobola okukola enteekateeka ey'enjawulo.

contact.title: Tuweereze
contact.subtitle: Olina ebibuuzo? Twagala okuwulira okuva gy'oli. Tuweereze obubaka era tujja kukuddamu mangu.
